cards.rules_text: {1}{W}, {T}: Exile Dawn Guide and another target creature you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
Protection from Bullets [i](This creature can’t be blocked, targeted or dealt damage by Bullets.)[/i]

Flash
When Marshal’s Sharpshooter enters, you may return another target creature you control to its owner’s hand.
When St. Musset Wranglers enters, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Whenever Trader Family or another creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Whenever Tsimtsuk Trackers enters or becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]Hardened[/i] — At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.
Prevent all damage target attacking creature would deal this turn. If there is a card named Warning Shot in your graveyard, exile that creature.
Put a shield counter on each of two target creatures and/or planeswalkers. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]

Flash
Mist-Veiled Harrier enters with a shield counter on it. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]

St. Musset Cutpurse can’t be blocked.
Once each turn, whenever creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may have St. Musset Cutpurse get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Flash
When Alleyway Broker enters, you may return another target creature to its owner’s hand. That creature’s controller draws a card.
When Frontier Surveyors enters, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
When Stormbringer enters, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. Exile that spell as it resolves.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities, can’t have or gain abilities, and has base power and toughness 0/1.

Surveil 1, then draw a card.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Choose one — 
• Tap target nonland permanent.
• The next spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter and a hexproof counter on target creature.
Counter target spell. Its controller adds mana equal to that spell’s mana cost. [i](Mana cost includes color. If a mana symbol has multiple colors, choose one.)[/i]

[i]Hardened[/i] — You may cast this spell from your graveyard if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.
Carrion Wagon enters tapped.
When Contracted Gunslinger enters, create a tapped Bullet token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.”)[/i]

When Crooked Lawman enters, surveil 2.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

[i]Hardened[/i] — Whenever Jackle’s Gang attacks, create a tapped and attacking 3/2 black Rogue creature token if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control. Sacrifice that token at end of turn.

Create a 3/2 black Rogue creature token and a tapped Bullet token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.”)[/i]
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Sacrifice another creature: Band of Outlaws gets +2/+0 and gains menace end of turn.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-3. If it’s a Rogue, instead it gets +3/+0 and has “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.”

Sins for Sins deals 3 damage to target opponent. You gain 3 life.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste. It deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Other Soldiers you control get +1/+1 and have menace.
Other Rogues you control get +1/+1 and have haste.
When Worn Trailblazers enters, you may discard a land card. If you do, draw a card and create a Gold token. [i](It’s an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Haste
Whenever another creature or token enters under your control, Marshal’s Courier gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Mountain Path Wildcat attacks, target creature can’t block this turn.

Haste
Whenever Getaway Rider attacks, put a loot counter on it.
Getaway Rider gets +1/+0 for each counter on it.
Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens with haste and a 3/2 black Rogue creature token.

Put a taunted counter on target creature. [i](It attacks each combat if able.)[/i]
Draw a card.
Smoking Barrels deals 1 damage to any target. Create a tapped Bullet token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.”)[/i]

Flash
When Foliage Lurker enters, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

When Prospector Gang enters, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card, then put those cards into your graveyard. Create a Gold token. [i](It’s an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
When Stoic Builder enters, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. You gain 2 life.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Once each turn, whenever a creature you control becomes the target or a spell or ability you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter or a vigilance counter on that creature.
[i]Hardened[/i] — Tsimtsuk Trapper can’t attack unless there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.

Territorial Grizzlies enters with a trample counter on it if it wasn’t cast from your hand.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]
Choose two target creatures that don’t share a controller. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures, then they fight each other. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
[i]Hardened[/i] — When Young Gun enters, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Soldier you control.

Choose any target. Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to you and/or permanents you control this turn. Whenever damage is prevented this way, Count of Three deals that much damage to the chosen permanent or player.
When Homestead’s Finest enters, create X 2/2 white Hound creature tokens.

All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Grim Farmhand instead.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each counter type among permanents you control.
Vigilance

Whenever Frontier Homesteader becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, until end of turn, it gains protection from everything you don’t control. [i](This creature can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything you don’t control.)[/i]

Flash
When Annabelle, the Self-Made Widow enters, choose target spell or permanent. Until your next end step, you and permanents you control have protection from that spell or permanent.
Put a +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on target creature.
Exile target nonland permanent. Starting next turn, as long as it remains exiled, its owner may return it to the battlefield any time they could cast an instant.

Adventurous Daughter can’t be blocked.
Whenever Adventurous Daughter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal two land cards, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

If it isn’t an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
Once each turn, whenever you cast a spell with mana value 3 or less, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from a graveyard or a permanent enters under your control from a graveyard, draw a card, then Ol’ Danny Damnations deals 1 damage to each player.

Enchant player
Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage, enchanted player loses 1 life.

Choose target creature card in your graveyard. If it was put there from the battlefield this turn, you may return it to the battlefield tapped with a menace counter on it. Otherwise, return it to your hand.

Choose one — 
• Destroy target creature with no counters on it.
• Remove up to three counters from target creature.

{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Ill-Met Desperado gains indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Hardened[/i] — Whenever another creature dies, Ill-Met Desperado deals 2 damage to target player if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.

When Rodeo Roughie enters, create a Gold token. [i](It’s an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Creatures you control enter with an additional +1/+1 counter on them for each mana from a token spent to cast it.

Breakaway Carriage enters with two haste counters on it.
Creatures you control with haste get +1/+1.
Whenever another creature enters under your control, you may move a counter from Breakaway Carriage onto it.
Burn What’s Left deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, instead exile it and each of its activated and triggered abilities.
Choose target creature you control. Exile it and the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play cards exiled this way.
Excavation Crew gets +1/+1 as long as there’s one or more land cards in your graveyard.

When Roughstock Rider enters, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.special_text:
Edith enters with a shield counter on her. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[+1]: Until your next turn, Edith becomes a legendary 0/0 Human creature with “Edith gets +1/+1 for each counter type among permanents you control.”
[0]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

cards.rules_text:
When Tales Passed Down enters the battlefield, put a trample counter on target creature you control.
Creatures you control have “Once each turn, whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.”

When Gourd Gatherers enters the battlefield, put a harvest counter on target land.
Whenever a land you control becomes tapped for mana, if it has one or more counters on it, add {G}.

When St. Musset Reporters enters, target player draws a card.
When St. Musset Reporters dies, each player draws a card.
Each player mills three cards. Choose a card milled this way. You may cast it. If you don’t, return that card to its owner’s hand.

Hellfire Hand enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Remove a counter from Hellfire Hand: Hellfire Hand deals 2 damage to each opponent.

When Emerge from the Dust enters, create a 3/2 black Rogue creature token.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, return Emerge from the Dust to its owner’s hand.

When Hardy Pilgrims enters, distribute two of the following counters among one or two target creatures —
• A lifelink counter.
• A vigilance counter.
• A hexproof counter.
• A trample counter.
• A +1/+1 counter.

When Grace’s Deputies enters, put a lifelink counter on target permanent.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Flash
Whenever Tsimtsuk Messenger enters or attacks, tap up to one target creature.

Harried Rancher can’t block.
When Harried Rancher dies, you mill three cards, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.
Once each turn, whenever Riverway Hunters becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may copy that spell or ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Flash
When Ap’haro Outrider enters, if it was cast, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from a graveyard, Investment Magnate deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

If you would create one or more tokens, create those tokens and a Gold token instead. [i](It’s an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{1}{R}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. You gain 1 life.

You may play land cards from graveyards.
{20}: You win the game. Activate only as a sorcery.
Once each turn, whenever Seasoned Pathfinder becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may draw a card.
[i]Hardened[/i] — Ap’haro Hunter gets +2/+2 as long as there are three or more counter types among permanents you control.

Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each type of counter on it.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Whenever a creature you control dies, for each counter on it, you may put that type of counter or a +1/+1 counter on another creature you control.
{1}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

Once each turn, whenever a spell or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell of ability you control, you may have Opportunistic Sharpshooter deal 3 damage to that spell or permanent’s controller.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of creatures.
Search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creatures total mana value, put it onto the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter and a deathtouch counter on it, then shuffle.

Choose one or more —
• You may cast target nonland card with mana value X or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.
• The Wind Howls deals X damage to any target.

When Marshal Grace enters, create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens with haste.
Marshal Grace’s power is equal to the number of Soldiers you control.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]
Whenever St. Musset Outfitter or another creature enters under your control, exile the top card of your library. You may create a Gold token. If you don’t, you may play that card until end of turn.

Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat. Untap it if it hasn’t dealt combat damage this turn.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color, then put a mining counter on River of Gold. This ability costs {1} more to activate for each mining counter on River of Gold.

Marked Shot enters tapped with a vendetta counter on it.
{1}, {T}: Put a vendetta counter on Marked Shot.
{T}, Sacrifice Marked Shot: Marked Shot deals damage equal to the number of vendetta counters on it to any target.

When Wanted Poster enters, if it was cast, search your library for a Deed card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Wanted Poster: Add one mana of any color.

Crate of Explosives enters with X dynamite counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Crate of Explosives. If you do, it deals damage equal to the number of counters on it to each creature.
Whenever a nonartifact creature dies, you may create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s an artifact. Otherwise, you gain 1 life. [i](It’s no longer a creature.)[/i]

Whenever White-Water Canoe attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on White-Water Canoe, then you may mill a card.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Trample
If a source would deal 2 or less damage to The Transcontinental, prevent that damage.
Crew 4
You may cast The Transcontinental from your graveyard by discarding two land cards in addition to paying its other costs.

Express Locomotive can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Familiar Trails enters tapped.
When Familiar Trails enters, surveil 1, then choose a color. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Familiar Trails enters tapped.
When Familiar Trails enters, surveil 1, then choose a color. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Familiar Trails enters tapped.
When Familiar Trails enters, surveil 1, then choose a color. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Familiar Trails enters tapped.
When Familiar Trails enters, surveil 1, then choose a color. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Familiar Trails enters tapped.
When Familiar Trails enters, surveil 1, then choose a color. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
Retribution [i](When this creature dies, if it had no taunted counters, return it the battlefield tapped with a taunted counter that makes it attack each combat if able.)[/i]

Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Target player discards a card. Past Laid to Rest deals 1 damage to you.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
Retrace [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Deed — Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

A creature enters under your control.
I, II — Put a first strike counter on target creature you control.
Deed — When you complete this deed, you may exile target creature until Frontier Justice leaves the battlefield. If you don’t, draw a card.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
I — Two or more card types have been put into graveyards from anywhere this turn.
II — Burning St. Musset deals 2 damage to each player.
Deed — At the beginning of your end step, Burning St. Musset deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a lawless counter on Out For Blood.
{2}{B}, Remove X counters from Out For Blood: Out For Blood deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.
Untap target creature you control and put a +1/+1 counter and a vigilance counter on it.
Reveal your hand. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Discard all the cards in one of those piles, then draw that many cards plus two.

Surveil 1. When you do, choose one. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
• Draw a card. Gift of the Asp deals 1 damage to you.
• Put a deathtouch counter on target permanent.

Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage, put a wreckage counter on Wreckage Below.
{2}, Remove a counter from Wreckage Below: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

cards.special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
You cast a spell from a graveyard or during an opponent’s turn.
I, II — Mill two cards, then draw a card.
Deed — At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, untap up to two permanents you control.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
I — A spell or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell or ability you control.
II — Return up to one target spell or nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
Deed — Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A non-resolving card is put into an opponent’s graveyard from anywhere
I — Put a wealth counter on target land. As long as that land has a wealth counter on it, it has “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”
II, Deed — Once during each of your turns, you may cast a copy of a card in an opponent’s graveyard by exiling that card in addition to its other costs.

cards.rules_text: Haste

cards.special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A Rogue or Bullet you control deals damage.
I — Destroy up to one target permanent if it was dealt damage this turn.
II, Deed — If a Rogue or Bullet you control would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. [i](Damage that finishes this deed isn’t increased.)[/i]

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
It’s your end step and you haven’t cast a spell this turn.
I — Draw two cards.
Discard a card.
II — Once during each opponent’s turn, you may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost and as though it had flash.

cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A creature you control attacks alone.
I, II, Deed — Exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield tapped and attacking under your control. Its owner gains control of it at end of combat.
Creatures you control can’t be blocked by more than one creature.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A creature or land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.
I, II — Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Deed — At the beginning of your end step, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control.
I, II — Each opponent exiles the top five cards of their library. You gain 5 life.
Deed — You have no maximum hand size.
If a player would draw one or more cards, they draw twice that many cards instead.

Flash
You may activate Mishka’s loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant. If you do, they cost an additional [-2] to activate.
[+1]: Surveil 1. Draw a card.
[-1]: Return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.

cards.rules_text:
First strike
When Jackle enters and whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage, put a pistolero counter on Jackle.
Whenever Jackle attacks, remove any number of counters from it, then create that many Bullet tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.”)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
I — A land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.
You gain 3 life.
II, Deed — When you complete this deed, choose up to one target creature. If you do, Leaving It Behind becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Attach it to that creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard and has hexproof.

[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
You attack.
I, II — Create a tapped and attacking 3/2 black Rogue creature token. Put a menace or deathtouch counter on it.
Deed — [i]Hardened[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if there are three or more counter types among permanents you control, create a 3/2 black Rogue creature token.
